title: Best Hotels in Hyderabad are Loaded with Modern Luxuries for Global Guests (Kirti Sharma)
text: By Kirti Sharma Jul 20, 2015 For a royal experience in the erstwhile city of the Nizams, where the world-renowned Salar Jung Museum woos global tourists with fabulous collection of jewels and treasures, where the exquisite pearl trade flourishes and fashions splendid ornaments to adorn alabaster necks, where the irresistible aromas of the famous biryani assail the nostrils with its tempting invitation to taste, where the implacable CharMinar stands as the unshakable legacy of a bygone age - a kaleidoscope of myriad-hued images to gladden the heart and capture the soul - so come experience them all from your luxurious abode of the best hotels in Hyderabad!These luxurious hotels near Film Nagar Hyderabad , in proximity to a glittering film industry, woo you with pleasure and look after you with a sense of pride and privilege, making you feels infinitely special! So, come explore their particular brand of hospitality and indulge yourself.Commence with the best, if you are acquiescent to experiencing some luxury and lavishness in the palatial Presidential suite. Comprising two elegant bedrooms and a separate sitting room where you can entertain visitors or friends, there is also a dining area adjoining the sitting area with requisite furniture for you to dine comfortably. In such best hotels in Hyderabad , you can pamper yourself with a personal Jacuzzi and an in-room microwave to have piping hot food. With other conveniences such as tea/coffee maker, an electronic safe, a mini- bar and Wi-Fi in this privileged suite, as well as in the Executive suite tailor made for comfort with its contemporary ambience, a separate bedroom and a living room with a dining table, and other air-conditioned accommodation, you can be confident of comfort here! Hotels near Film Nagar Hyderabad also thoughtfully provides accommodation for the differently abled guest, with wider entrance and washroom door for effortless wheelchair access. With a chair in the bath area and lower vanity and water closet and special amenities, differently abled guests are equally welcome here! When you stay in the best hotels in Hyderabad, you are also entitled to an array of other spacious and elegant living options, such as the Superior, Deluxe rooms with their vibrant furnishings and art works and the more subtly furnished Executive room, befitting a savvy business guest. With well-appointed en-suite bathrooms with branded toiletries, you can carry out your ablutions in a leisurely, relaxed manner here!Indulge yourself and relax in the laid back recreation bar with its casual ambience, sipping your favourite cocktail and trying your hand at Pool. Or saunter down to the unique Pan-Asian restaurant with popular food from Thailand, Vietnam, Singapore, Cambodia, Indonesia and Myanmar, titillating your taste-buds into delicious culinary surrender and savour life's feast in best hotels in Hyderabad !
